title: Deliver with Checkers Sixty60 or Uber Eats
description: Sign up as a delivery partner and get paid to deliver groceries and food in your neighbourhood. Flexible hours, weekly payouts.

title: Sell Handmade or Secondhand on Facebook Marketplace
description: Use Facebook Marketplace to sell items from home — no shop, no fees, no startup cost. Reach buyers in your local area instantly.

title: Teach Online with Superprof or Teach Me 2
description: If you passed matric or have any skill others want to learn, you can earn R100–R450/hour tutoring learners in your area or online.

title: Earn on SagaPoll: Get Paid for Your Opinion
description: SagaPoll is a 100% African survey platform where you answer quick surveys and earn cash or airtime — no cost to join.

title: Earn with SweepSouth: Domestic Work on Your Terms
description: SweepSouth connects you with vetted homeowners for cleaning and domestic work. Set your own hours, get paid weekly via EFT.

title: Label Data for AI with Toloka: R50–R300/day from Your Phone
description: Toloka is a micro-task platform where you complete small data-labeling jobs for AI companies. Works on any smartphone, pays via PayPal.
